review: A great human being and an equally good doctor. My mother has rheumatoid arthritis which is now well controlled under Dr Sigh's care. I am very thankful to him. He believes in minimum number of investigations and as few medicines as possible. I would highly recommend Dr Singh.

I went to visit Dr.Singh for my grandfather as he had incapacitating knee pain. We had been suggested knee replacement by many doctors and we had an option of going to any corporate hospitals but we are glad that we got it done from Dr. J P Singh. Other than a near perfect surgery, his guidance in pre operative and post operative care has been impeccable. A good surgeon and a real gentleman.

I had ACL tear which I was afraid to get operated as a relative had bad experience with this surgery. Then I visited Dr JP Singh who gave me a lot of confidence. Dr J P Singh did ACL surgery of my knee and I am playing cricket now, just six months after surgery, thank god and thank dr j p Singh

It is by God's grace that I met Dr J P Singh. I am so happy that my grandmother got her knees replaced by him. She has excellent recovery and now absolutely pain free. Now she is able to do all her activities independently without any need for help. Now she always walks down to mandir for daily Puja

Very positive views of the doctor. He listened very patiently, explained everything in layman language which we understood well, and my mother is very happy after her hip replacement. She can walk comfortably, and has no remaining limp. those who dont know that she had a surgery cannot tell the difference from a normal person. May God bless Dr J P Singh so that he continues to help patients

Great doctor. One of the best in delhi. My brother had a terrible case, had 3 surgeries done already at max and fortis, but failed. Dr J P singh assured us and gave the result. I am so happy to see my brother walk after 2 years and 3 failed operations

Doctor with great energy, and enthusiasm to treat patients. He is fully dedicated in recovery of patients.

Dr Singh is definitely expert of knee surgery. He replaced knee of my grandma who is 78 year old. We were afraid whether she will be doing fine after surgery at this age, but happy to say that she is doing well. Now, she walks for 30 minutes in park and is absolutely pain free and happy
Magical experience. My recovery has been very fast and my bent legs have become straight. Recommended doctor for knee replacement
He is a very nice and experienced doctor. After one month of persistent pain and visiting 2 doctors before, now i can say that i have found a good doctor.

He is excellent and a wonderfull doctor. Having good knowledge and perfect treatment concept. I am fully satisfied and personaly say He is most friendly and knowledgable Doctor whom i ever meet.
Best Doctor in DELHI
Great doctor. Always treats with a smile. Listens patiently, and gives clear explanation. My mother is very happy with her new knees. I will say that he is the one doctor who is best

I injured my right hand in machine. My hand had lot of bleeding and completely lost its shape. Just a look made me think I will lose my hand. Thanks to Dr J P Singh my hand is OK now and I am back to work
My husband had multiple fractures in thigh and hand. Many doctors had refused treatment as they were not confident of making him OK. Thanks to dr JP Singh, my husband is on his feet again
